tool.name: CSP2 (Screening Mode)
tool.description: Screen query assemblies against reference assemblies

param.name: min_cov
param.label: Minimum reference genome coverage to proceed with distance estimation

param.name: min_iden
param.label: Minimum alignment percent identity to detect SNPs

param.name: min_len
param.label: Minimum alignment length to detect SNPs

param.name: ref_edge
param.label: Prune SNPs within this many bases of reference contig edge

param.name: query_edge
param.label: Prune SNPs within this many bases of query contig edge

param.name: dwin
param.label: Comma-separated set of window sizes for SNP density filtration (Set to 0 to disable density filtration)

param.name: wsnps
param.label: Comma-separated list of maximum SNP counts per density window

param.name: trim_name
param.label: Text to remove from all file names (e.g., _contigs_skesa)

param.name: ref_id
param.label: Comma-separated list of desired Reference IDs (e.g., Sample_A,Sample_B)

tool.help: This tool takes query assemblies and reference assemblies and calculates the pairwise distance between each query/reference combination. If no reference is provided, all queries are compared to all other queries.
